instructions.name: initialize
docs: Create a new candy guard account.

instructions.name: mint
docs: Mint an NFT from a candy machine wrapped in the candy guard.

instructions.name: mintV2
docs: Mint an NFT from a candy machine wrapped in the candy guard.

accounts.name: candyGuard
docs: Candy Guard account.

accounts.name: candyMachineProgram
docs: Candy Machine program account.

accounts.name: candyMachine
docs: Candy machine account.

accounts.name: candyMachineAuthorityPda
docs: Candy Machine authority account.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer for the mint (SOL) fees.

accounts.name: minter
docs: Minter account for validation and non-SOL fees.

accounts.name: nftMint
docs: Mint account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.
Must be a signer if:
* the nft_mint account does not exist.

accounts.name: nftMintAuthority
docs: Mint authority of the NFT before the authority gets transfer to the master edition account.
If nft_mint account exists:
* it must match the mint authority of nft_mint.

accounts.name: nftMetadata
docs: Metadata account of the NFT. This account must be uninitialized.

accounts.name: nftMasterEdition
docs: Master edition account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.

accounts.name: token
docs: Destination token account (required for pNFT).

accounts.name: tokenRecord
docs: Token record (required for pNFT).

accounts.name: collectionDelegateRecord
docs: Collection authority or metadata delegate record.

accounts.name: collectionMint
docs: Mint account of the collection NFT.

accounts.name: collectionMetadata
docs: Metadata account of the collection NFT.

accounts.name: collectionMasterEdition
docs: Master edition account of the collection NFT.

accounts.name: collectionUpdateAuthority
docs: Update authority of the collection NFT.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: Token Metadata program.

accounts.name: splTokenProgram
docs: SPL Token program.

accounts.name: splAtaProgram
docs: SPL Associated Token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: System program.

accounts.name: sysvarInstructions
docs: Instructions sysvar account.

accounts.name: recentSlothashes
docs: SlotHashes sysvar cluster data.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: Token Authorization Rules program.

accounts.name: authorizationRules
docs: Token Authorization rules account for the collection metadata (if any).

instructions.name: route
docs: Route the transaction to a guard instruction.

instructions.name: setAuthority
docs: Set a new authority of the candy guard.

instructions.name: unwrap
docs: Remove a candy guard from a candy machine, setting the authority to the
candy guard authority.

instructions.name: update
docs: Update the candy guard configuration.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw the rent SOL from the candy guard account.

instructions.name: wrap
docs: Add a candy guard to a candy machine. After the guard is added, mint
is only allowed through the candy guard.

accounts.name: FreezeEscrow
docs: PDA to store the frozen funds.

fields.name: candyGuard
docs: Candy guard address associated with this escrow.

fields.name: candyMachine
docs: Candy machine address associated with this escrow.

fields.name: frozenCount
docs: Number of NFTs frozen.

fields.name: firstMintTime
docs: The timestamp of the first (frozen) mint. This is used to calculate
when the freeze period is over.

fields.name: freezePeriod
docs: The amount of time (in seconds) for the freeze. The NFTs will be
allowed to thaw after this.

fields.name: destination
docs: The destination address for the frozen fund to go to.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority that initialized the freeze. This will be the only
address able to unlock the funds in case the candy guard account is
closed.

types.name: AddressGate
docs: Guard that restricts access to a specific address.

types.name: Allocation
docs: Gaurd to specify the maximum number of mints in a guard set.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Mint tracker PDA. The PDA is derived
using the seed `["allocation", allocation id,
candy guard pubkey, candy machine pubkey]`.

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier of the allocation.

fields.name: size
docs: The size of the allocation.

types.name: MintTracker
docs: PDA to track the number of mints.

types.name: AllowList
docs: Guard that uses a merkle tree to specify the addresses allowed to mint.
List of accounts required:
0. `[]` Pda created by the merkle proof instruction (seeds `["allow_list", merke tree root,
payer key, candy guard pubkey, candy machine pubkey]`).

fields.name: merkleRoot
docs: Merkle root of the addresses allowed to mint.

types.name: AllowListProof
docs: PDA to track whether an address has been validated or not.

types.name: BotTax
docs: Guard is used to:
* charge a penalty for invalid transactions
* validate that the mint transaction is the last transaction
* verify that only authorized programs have instructions
The `bot_tax` is applied to any error that occurs during the
validation of the guards.

types.name: EndDate
docs: Guard that sets a specific date for the mint to stop.

types.name: FreezeSolPayment
docs: Guard that charges an amount in SOL (lamports) for the mint with a freeze period.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Freeze PDA to receive the funds (seeds `["freeze_escrow",
destination pubkey, candy guard pubkey, candy machine pubkey]`).
1. `[]` Associate token account of the NFT (seeds `[payer pubkey, token
program pubkey, nft mint pubkey]`).
2. `[optional]` Authorization rule set for the minted pNFT.

types.name: FreezeTokenPayment
docs: Guard that charges an amount in a specified spl-token as payment for the mint with a freeze period.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Freeze PDA to receive the funds (seeds `["freeze_escrow",
destination_ata pubkey, candy guard pubkey, candy machine pubkey]`).
1. `[]` Associate token account of the NFT (seeds `[payer pubkey, token
program pubkey, nft mint pubkey]`).
2. `[writable]` Token account holding the required amount.
3. `[writable]` Associate token account of the Freeze PDA (seeds `[freeze PDA
pubkey, token program pubkey, nft mint pubkey]`).
4. `[optional]` Authorization rule set for the minted pNFT.

types.name: Gatekeeper
docs: Guard that validates if the payer of the transaction has a token from a specified
gateway network â€” in most cases, a token after completing a captcha challenge.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writeable]` Gatekeeper token account.
1. `[]` Gatekeeper program account.
2. `[]` Gatekeeper expire account.

fields.name: gatekeeperNetwork
docs: The network for the gateway token required

fields.name: expireOnUse
docs: Whether or not the token should expire after minting.
The gatekeeper network must support this if true.

types.name: MintLimit
docs: Gaurd to set a limit of mints per wallet.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Mint counter PDA. The PDA is derived
using the seed `["mint_limit", mint guard id, payer key,
candy guard pubkey, candy machine pubkey]`.

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier of the mint limit.

fields.name: limit
docs: Limit of mints per individual address.

types.name: MintCounter
docs: PDA to track the number of mints for an individual address.

types.name: NftBurn
docs: Guard that requires another NFT (token) from a specific collection to be burned.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writeable]` Token account of the NFT.
1. `[writeable]` Metadata account of the NFT.
2. `[writeable]` Master Edition account of the NFT.
3. `[writeable]` Mint account of the NFT.
4. `[writeable]` Collection metadata account of the NFT.
5. `[writeable]` Token Record of the NFT (pNFT).

types.name: NftGate
docs: Guard that restricts the transaction to holders of a specified collection.
List of accounts required:
0. `[]` Token account of the NFT.
1. `[]` Metadata account of the NFT.

types.name: NftPayment
docs: Guard that charges another NFT (token) from a specific collection as payment
for the mint.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writeable]` Token account of the NFT.
1. `[writeable]` Metadata account of the NFT.
2. `[]` Mint account of the NFT.
3. `[]` Account to receive the NFT.
4. `[writeable]` Destination PDA key (seeds [destination pubkey, token program id, nft mint pubkey]).
5. `[]` spl-associate-token program ID.
6. `[]` Master edition (pNFT)
7. `[writable]` Owner token record (pNFT)
8. `[writable]` Destination token record (pNFT)
9. `[]` Token Authorization Rules program (pNFT)
10. `[]` Token Authorization Rules account (pNFT)

types.name: ProgramGate
docs: Guard that restricts the programs that can be in a mint transaction. The guard allows the
necessary programs for the mint and any other program specified in the configuration.

types.name: RedeemedAmount
docs: Guard that stop the mint once the specified amount of items
redeenmed is reached.

types.name: SolPayment
docs: Guard that charges an amount in SOL (lamports) for the mint.
List of accounts required:
0. `[]` Account to receive the funds.

types.name: StartDate
docs: Guard that sets a specific start date for the mint.

types.name: ThirdPartySigner
docs: Guard that requires a specified signer to validate the transaction.
List of accounts required:
0. `[signer]` Signer of the transaction.

types.name: TokenBurn
docs: Guard that requires addresses that hold an amount of a specified spl-token
and burns them.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Token account holding the required amount.
1. `[writable]` Token mint account.

types.name: TokenGate
docs: Guard that restricts access to addresses that hold the specified spl-token.
List of accounts required:
0. `[]` Token account holding the required amount.

types.name: TokenPayment
docs: Guard that charges an amount in a specified spl-token as payment for the mint.
List of accounts required:
0. `[writable]` Token account holding the required amount.
1. `[writable]` Address of the ATA to receive the tokens.

types.name: RouteArgs
docs: Arguments for a route transaction.

fields.name: guard
docs: The target guard type.

fields.name: data
docs: Arguments for the guard instruction.

types.name: Group
docs: A group represent a specific set of guards. When groups are used, transactions
must specify which group should be used during validation.

types.name: GuardSet
docs: The set of guards available.

fields.name: botTax
docs: Last instruction check and bot tax (penalty for invalid transactions).

fields.name: solPayment
docs: Sol payment guard (set the price for the mint in lamports).

fields.name: tokenPayment
docs: Token payment guard (set the price for the mint in spl-token amount).

fields.name: startDate
docs: Start data guard (controls when minting is allowed).

fields.name: thirdPartySigner
docs: Third party signer guard (requires an extra signer for the transaction).

fields.name: tokenGate
docs: Token gate guard (restrict access to holders of a specific token).

fields.name: gatekeeper
docs: Gatekeeper guard (captcha challenge).

fields.name: endDate
docs: End date guard (set an end date to stop the mint).

fields.name: allowList
docs: Allow list guard (curated list of allowed addresses).

fields.name: mintLimit
docs: Mint limit guard (add a limit on the number of mints per wallet).

fields.name: nftPayment
docs: NFT Payment (charge an NFT in order to mint).

fields.name: redeemedAmount
docs: Redeemed amount guard (add a limit on the overall number of items minted).

fields.name: addressGate
docs: Address gate (check access against a specified address).

fields.name: nftGate
docs: NFT gate guard (check access based on holding a specified NFT).

fields.name: nftBurn
docs: NFT burn guard (burn a specified NFT).

fields.name: tokenBurn
docs: Token burn guard (burn a specified amount of spl-token).

fields.name: freezeSolPayment
docs: Freeze sol payment guard (set the price for the mint in lamports with a freeze period).

fields.name: freezeTokenPayment
docs: Freeze token payment guard (set the price for the mint in spl-token amount with a freeze period).

fields.name: programGate
docs: Program gate guard (restricts the programs that can be in a mint transaction).

fields.name: allocation
docs: Allocation guard (specify the maximum number of mints in a group).

types.name: GuardType
docs: Available guard types.

errors.name: InvalidAccountSize
errors.msg: Could not save guard to account

errors.name: IncorrectOwner
errors.msg: Account does not have correct owner

errors.name: CollectionUpdateAuthorityKeyMismatch
errors.msg: Collection update authority public key mismatch

errors.name: MintNotLastTransaction
errors.msg: Mint must be the last instructions of the transaction

errors.name: NotEnoughSOL
errors.msg: Not enough SOL to pay for the mint

errors.name: NotEnoughTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens on the account

errors.name: MissingRequiredSignature
errors.msg: A signature was required but not found

errors.name: AfterEndDate
errors.msg: Current time is after the set end date

errors.name: InvalidMintTime
errors.msg: Current time is not within the allowed mint time

errors.name: AddressNotFoundInAllowedList
errors.msg: Address not found on the allowed list

errors.name: AllowedListNotEnabled
errors.msg: Allow list guard is not enabled

errors.name: AllowedMintLimitReached
errors.msg: The maximum number of allowed mints was reached

errors.name: MaximumRedeemedAmount
errors.msg: Current redemeed items is at the set maximum amount

errors.name: FreezeEscrowAlreadyExists
errors.msg: The freeze escrow account already exists

errors.name: UnlockNotEnabled
errors.msg: Unlock is not enabled (not all NFTs are thawed)

errors.name: UnauthorizedProgramFound
errors.msg: An unauthorized program was found in the transaction

errors.name: ExceededProgramListSize
errors.msg: Exceeded the maximum number of programs in the additional list

errors.name: InvalidMintAuthority
errors.msg: Candy machine has an invalid mint authority
